card.name: Abyssal Hunter
card.property: {B}, {T}: Tap target creature. Abyssal Hunter deals damage equal to Abyssal Hunter's power to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some smiles show cheer; some merely show teeth.

card.name: Acidic Dagger
card.property: {4}, {T}: Whenever target creature deals combat damage to a non-Wall creature this turn, destroy that non-Wall creature. When the targeted creature leaves the battlefield this turn, sacrifice Acidic Dagger. Activate this ability only before blockers are declared.

card.name: Afiya Grove
card.property: Afiya Grove enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, move a +1/+1 counter from Afiya Grove onto target creature. When Afiya Grove has no +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice it.

card.name: Afterlife
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Facets of life, reflections of the soul.

card.name: Agility
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flanking. (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

card.name: Alarum
card.property: Untap target nonattacking creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One timely cry of warning can save nine of surprise." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Aleatory
card.property: Cast Aleatory only during combat after blockers are declared. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Amber Prison
card.property: You may choose not to untap Amber Prison during your untap step. {4}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Amber Prison remains tapped.

card.name: Amulet of Unmaking
card.property: {5}, {T}, Exile Amulet of Unmaking: Exile target artifact, creature, or land. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Trade to trade, not to keep. —Suq'Ata motto

card.name: Ancestral Memories
card.property: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even the ancient storytellers proclaimed Zhalfir to be dominant over all Jamuraa. Kaervek's invasion shocked us all." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Armor of Thorns
card.property: You may cast Armor of Thorns as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant nonblack creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

card.name: Armorer Guildmage
card.property: {B}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zhalfir's destiny rings in tempered steel. —Armorer Guild maxim

card.name: Ashen Powder
card.property: Put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you call decay, I call ripening. You'll gain no sustenance from this harvest." —Kaervek

card.name: Asmira, Holy Avenger
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each end step, put a +1/+1 counter on Asmira, Holy Avenger for each creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Omens lie in this early harvest's fruit." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Auspicious Ancestor
card.property: When Auspicious Ancestor dies, you gain 3 life. Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Azimaet Drake
card.property: Flying {U}: Azimaet Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A vizier's dish, best served drenched in honey and almonds." —Suq'Ata royal recipe

card.name: Bad River
card.property: Bad River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Bad River: Search your library for an Island or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Barbed Foliage
card.property: Whenever a creature attacks you, it loses flanking until end of turn. Whenever a creature without flying attacks you, Barbed Foliage deals 1 damage to it.

card.name: Barbed-Back Wurm
card.property: {B}: Target green creature blocking Barbed-Back Wurm gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Mwonvuli Jungle has given the darkness teeth for tearing the gift of life from the weak." —Jolrael

card.name: Barreling Attack
card.property: Target creature gains trample until end of turn. When that creature becomes blocked this turn, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The trollish game of push-fall inspired this impressive tactic." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Basalt Golem
card.property: Basalt Golem can't be blocked by artifact creatures. Whenever Basalt Golem becomes blocked by a creature, that creature's controller sacrifices it at end of combat. If the player does, he or she creates a 0/2 colorless Wall artifact creature token with defender.

card.name: Bay Falcon
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Wear the falcon's feathers in your hair— be fast as the falcon, bright as the Sun." —"Rise on Wings," Zhalfirin song

card.name: Bazaar of Wonders
card.property: When Bazaar of Wonders enters the battlefield, exile all cards from all graveyards. Whenever a player casts a spell, counter it if a card with the same name is in a graveyard or a nontoken permanent with the same name is on the battlefield.

card.name: Benevolent Unicorn
card.property: If a spell would deal damage to a creature or player, it deals that much damage minus 1 to that creature or player instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best use for a unicorn's horn is to adorn a unicorn. —Femeref adage

card.name: Benthic Djinn
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In all my years I've only met one mage who successfully trapped a djinn—and none who tried and failed." —Talibah, embermage

card.name: Binding Agony
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature is dealt damage, Binding Agony deals that much damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A crash of rhinos in my head —Femeref expression meaning "a severe head pain"

card.name: Blighted Shaman
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Blind Fury
card.property: All creatures lose trample until end of turn. If a creature would deal combat damage to a creature this turn, it deals double that damage to that creature instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tell me . . . have you ever sung the Song of Blood?" —Purraj of Urborg

card.name: Blinding Light
card.property: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My shield will bear a shining sun so you will always be with me. / Inlaid with gold, it will shine like glowing embers." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Blistering Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I live without food, stand without leg, wound without force, and am harder to fight than to kill. What am I? —Femeref riddle

card.name: Bone Harvest
card.property: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only fools believe they will face my armies but once." —Kaervek

card.name: Bone Mask
card.property: {2}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage. Exile cards from the top of your library equal to the damage prevented this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The protection offered comes at a price. How numerous are your kin?" —Purraj of Urborg

card.name: Boomerang
card.property: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lie always returns; be careful how you catch it.

card.name: Breathstealer
card.property: {B}: Breathstealer gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As a child, I slept with a cloth over my face, to hide from the spirits that might pull the air from my lungs." —Mosi, Femeref weaver

card.name: Brushwagg
card.property: Whenever Brushwagg blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Defiantly, the young cyclops popped the brushwagg into his mouth. His cheeks suddenly puffed, his eye bulged, and he was forced to agree with his elder." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Builder's Bane
card.property: Destroy X target artifacts. Builder's Bane deals damage to each player equal to the number of artifacts he or she controlled put into a graveyard this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is only so much a person may be buried with.

card.name: Burning Palm Efreet

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even the lion envies the lark.

card.name: Burning Shield Askari
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {R}{R}: Burning Shield Askari gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Any day that I ride my horse up to my ankles in the remains of my enemies is a good day." —Akin, seasoned askari

card.name: Cadaverous Bloom
card.property: Exile a card from your hand: Add {B}{B} or {G}{G} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's filthy work, planting them." —Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

card.name: Cadaverous Knight
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{B}{B}: Regenerate Cadaverous Knight.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Grieve for the soul in death dishonored. —Shadow Guild saying

card.name: Canopy Dragon
card.property: Trample {1}{G}: Canopy Dragon gains flying and loses trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the Mwonvuli you must divide your attention between what hangs overhead and what lies underfoot." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Carrion
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Carrion, sacrifice a creature. Create X 0/1 black Insect creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: King or herder, the maggots care not.

card.name: Catacomb Dragon
card.property: Flying Whenever Catacomb Dragon becomes blocked by a nonartifact, non-Dragon creature, that creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is half the creature's power, rounded down.

card.name: Celestial Dawn
card.property: Lands you control are Plains. Nonland permanents you control are white. The same is true for spells you control and nonland cards you own that aren't on the battlefield. You may spend white mana as though it were mana of any color. You may spend other mana only as though it were colorless mana.

card.name: Cerulean Wyvern
card.property: Flying, protection from green

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once, a Quirion asked why I was so cautious when the day was clear. I told him of the sky-blue hide of the cerluean wyvern, and he offered me double if I could conjure a strong tailwind!" —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

card.name: Chaos Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target Wall. • Chaos Charm deals 1 damage to target creature. • Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Chaosphere
card.property: Creatures with flying can block only creatures with flying. Creatures without flying have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I dance the nothing dance, / Feet in the air, knives in the ground." —Femeref chant

card.name: Charcoal Diamond
card.property: Charcoal Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Chariot of the Sun
card.property: {2}, {T}: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains flying and has base toughness 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sun follows Moon until she tires, then carries her until she's strong / and runs ahead of him again." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Choking Sands
card.property: Destroy target non-Swamp land. If that land was nonbasic, Choking Sands deals 2 damage to the land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The people wiped the sand from their eyes and cursed—and left the barren land to the hyenas and vipers." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Cinder Cloud
card.property: Destroy target creature. If a white creature dies this way, Cinder Cloud deals damage to that creature's controller equal to the creature's power.

card.name: Circle of Despair
card.property: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life is a resource that should belong only to the strong." —Shauku, Endbringer

card.name: Civic Guildmage
card.property: {G}, {T}: Target creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}, {T}: Put target creature you control on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To condemn the innocent you must first condemn yourself. —Civic Guild maxim

card.name: Cloak of Invisibility
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has phasing and can't be blocked except by Walls. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Useful . . . if you can find it." —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

card.name: Consuming Ferocity
card.property: Enchant non-Wall creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+0 counter on enchanted creature. If that creature has three or more +1/+0 counters on it, it deals damage equal to its power to its controller, then destroy that creature and it can't be regenerated.

card.name: Coral Fighters
card.property: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

card.name: Crash of Rhinos
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Love is like a rhino, short-sighted and hasty; if it cannot find a way, it will make a way. —Femeref adage

card.name: Crimson Hellkite
card.property: Flying {X}, {T}: Crimson Hellkite deals X damage to target creature. Spend only red mana on X.

card.name: Crimson Roc
card.property: Flying Whenever Crimson Roc blocks a creature without flying, Crimson Roc gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Crypt Cobra
card.property: Whenever Crypt Cobra attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Crystal Golem
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, Crystal Golem phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Once, a wealthy king commissioned an artificial creature to be crafted from the royal treasury, thinking it a clever ploy to have the jewels guard themselves." —Azeworai, "The Golem's Wish"

card.name: Crystal Vein
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Crystal Vein: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Cursed Totem
card.property: Activated abilities of creatures can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pass me from soul to soul / soldier to herder, herder to beast, beast to soil / until I am everywhere. / Then pass me those souls. —Totem inscription (translated)

card.name: Cycle of Life
card.property: Return Cycle of Life to its owner's hand: Target creature you cast this turn has base power and toughness 0/1 until your next upkeep. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.

card.name: Daring Apprentice
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Daring Apprentice: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In front of every great wizard is a doomed apprentice.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.property: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Femeref was guided by the wisdom of the Council of Voices. But in one terrible instant, they were slain, leaving Asmira as the sole voice of leadership." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Dark Ritual
card.property: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The ceremony ended with a voice from the shadows, a voice with vast, ominous power." —Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

card.name: Dazzling Beauty
card.property: Cast Dazzling Beauty only during the declare blockers step. Target unblocked attacking creature becomes blocked. (This spell works on creatures that can't be blocked.) Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Decomposition
card.property: Enchant black creature Enchanted creature has "Cumulative upkeep—Pay 1 life." (At the beginning of its controller's upkeep, that player puts an age counter on it, then sacrifices it unless he or she pays its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses 2 life.

card.name: Delirium
card.property: Cast Delirium only during an opponent's turn. Tap target creature that player controls. That creature deals damage equal to its power to the player. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by the creature this turn.

card.name: Dirtwater Wraith
card.property: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.) {B}: Dirtwater Wraith gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The foul entities of the Uuserk swamp had never before dared to spread their influence to the very heart of Zhalfir." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Discordant Spirit
card.property: At the beginning of each end step, if it's an opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Discordant Spirit for each 1 damage dealt to you this turn. At the beginning of your end step, remove all +1/+1 counters from Discordant Spirit.

card.name: Disempower
card.property: Put target artifact or enchantment on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mangara is gone. Who among you doubts that I have taken his power?" —Kaervek

card.name: Disenchant
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are harsher ways to learn the meaning of the word 'no.'" —Rashida Scalebane

card.name: Dissipate
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you weren't born with it, you don't need it." —Grahilah, former trader of Amiqat

card.name: Divine Offering
card.property: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Suq'Ata believe in trade; Femeref, alms; Zhalfirins, steel. Be warned, Kaervek—now we are joined." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Divine Retribution
card.property: Divine Retribution deals damage to target attacking creature equal to the number of attacking creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the undiscerning eye, justice and vengeance can look the same." —Rashida Scalebane

card.name: Drain Life
card.property: Spend only black mana on X. Drain Life deals X damage to target creature or player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more life than the player's life total before Drain Life dealt damage or the creature's toughness.

card.name: Dread Specter
card.property: Whenever Dread Specter blocks or becomes blocked by a nonblack creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whatever follows life is incurable. —Zhalfirin aphorism

card.name: Dream Cache
card.property: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dreams' riches are easily spent. —Suq'Ata adage

card.name: Dream Fighter
card.property: Whenever Dream Fighter blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Dream Fighter and that creature phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. Each one phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not only the sleeping should fear dreams.

card.name: Dwarven Miner
card.property: {2} {R}, {T}: Destroy target nonbasic land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fetch the pestridder, Paka—we've got dwarves in the rutabagas!" —Jamul, Femeref farmer

card.name: Dwarven Nomad
card.property: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A dwarf's life belongs as much to the land as to the dwarf. —Creed of the Stonethrow Clan

card.name: Early Harvest
card.property: Target player untaps all basic lands he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Tonight we'll eat a farewell feast. Cold corn porridge is not enough. / Let's peel papayas, pineapples, and mangoes, drink coconut milk, / and bake bananas." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Ebony Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. • Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard. • Target creature gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Ekundu Cyclops
card.property: If a creature you control attacks, Ekundu Cyclops also attacks if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Big one I, One big eye. One-eye see Two-eye die!" —Traditional cyclops chant

card.name: Ekundu Griffin
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My goat was a small price to pay for the chance to see the hunting griffin dive and seize it." —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

card.name: Elixir of Vitality
card.property: Elixir of Vitality enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Elixir of Vitality: You gain 4 life. {8}, {T}, Sacrifice Elixir of Vitality: You gain 8 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Eternal life or your money back." —Unnamed Suq'Ata merchant, deceased

card.name: Emberwilde Caliph
card.property: Flying, trample Emberwilde Caliph attacks each combat if able. Whenever Emberwilde Caliph deals damage, you lose that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The fire breathes while the air burns.

card.name: Emberwilde Djinn
card.property: Flying At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay {R}{R} or 2 life. If he or she does, the player gains control of Emberwilde Djinn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A hefty price is no guarantee of quality merchandise.

card.name: Energy Bolt
card.property: Choose one — • Energy Bolt deals X damage to target player. • Target player gains X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life and death are two faces of the same coin.

card.name: Energy Vortex
card.property: As Energy Vortex enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove all vortex counters from Energy Vortex. At the beginning of the chosen player's upkeep, Energy Vortex deals 3 damage to that player unless he or she pays {1} for each vortex counter on Energy Vortex. {X}: Put X vortex counters on Energy Vortex. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Enfeeblement
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it is weak, either kill it or ignore it. Anything else honors it." —Kaervek

card.name: Enlightened Tutor
card.property: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not teach. I simply reveal." —Daudi, Femeref tutor

card.name: Ersatz Gnomes
card.property: {T}: Target spell becomes colorless. {T}: Target permanent becomes colorless until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From jungle to sea, from sea to stone, from stone to field, from field to bone. What am I? —Zhalfirin riddle

card.name: Ether Well
card.property: Put target creature on top of its owner's library. If that creature is red, you may put it on the bottom of its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whoa—my tail will never fit through that hole!"

card.name: Ethereal Champion
card.property: Pay 1 life: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ethereal Champion this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I have learned anything as a wizard it is this: never fight your own battles." —Waffa, sorcerer of Nyomba

card.name: Fallow Earth
card.property: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . and when the farmer awoke the next morning, all the seeds from his field were once again in their sacks." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Favorable Destiny
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 as long as it's white. Enchanted creature has shroud as long as its controller controls another creature. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

card.name: Femeref Archers
card.property: {T}: Femeref Archers deals 4 damage to target attacking creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say a Zhalfirin archer can split the eye of a griffin. Nonsense, of course: they have no faith to guide their darts." —Nuru, Femeref archer

card.name: Femeref Healer
card.property: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Faith is my shield, and hope is my armor; I am vulnerable only to myself." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Femeref Knight
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {W}: Femeref Knight gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will return / with lizard skins for your sandals. Paint your eyes black and wait for me." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The days before the war were filled with strange portents: scouts and herders spoke of villages reduced to ash, of farmers taken from their fields, and of foul beasts roaming the plains in packs. I know, for I spoke to them all." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Feral Shadow
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The night stalkers are such a minor power in Urborg. Their sad eagerness to elevate themselves makes them willing tools in the plundering of little Femeref." —Kaervek

card.name: Fetid Horror
card.property: {B}: Fetid Horror gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Of the six who went down the Uuserek Trail to scout ahead, one returned. She clawed at her eyes and nostrils and sobbed with horror. I was curious about what she saw, but we chose another path." —Scout Ekemet, final journal

card.name: Final Fortune
card.property: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

card.name: Fire Diamond
card.property: Fire Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Firebreathing
card.property: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Magic's only part of it, my friend. Diet does the rest." —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

card.name: Flame Elemental
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Flame Elemental: Flame Elemental deals damage equal to its power to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Storyteller: By my hand in the fire, this story is a tale of power. Listeners: May it give you strength.

card.name: Flare
card.property: Flare deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the forest, fires light the sky as black clouds unfold their weight." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Flash
card.property: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you do, sacrifice it unless you pay its mana cost reduced by up to {2}.

card.name: Flood Plain
card.property: Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Floodgate
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Floodgate has flying, sacrifice it. When Floodgate leaves the battlefield, it deals damage equal to half the number of Islands you control, rounded down, to each nonblue creature without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quick, Rhirhok—teach me to swim!" —Makht, goblin casualty

card.name: Fog
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "More armies have been lost in the confusion of the jungle mists than to any battle." —Jolrael

card.name: Foratog
card.property: {G}, Sacrifice a Forest: Foratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Five hundred years to grow—barely a minute to eat.

card.name: Forbidden Crypt
card.property: If you would draw a card, return a card from your graveyard to your hand instead. If you can't, you lose the game. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile that card instead.

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forest
card.property: ({T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Forsaken Wastes
card.property: Players can't gain life. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player loses 1 life. Whenever Forsaken Wastes becomes the target of a spell, that spell's controller loses 5 life.

card.name: Frenetic Efreet
card.property: Flying {0}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Frenetic Efreet phases out. If you lose the flip, sacrifice Frenetic Efreet. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

card.name: Giant Mantis
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hate insects of every sort. The only mercy is that they are generally small." —Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

card.name: Gibbering Hyenas
card.property: Gibbering Hyenas can't block black creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hyenas laughing—what's the joke? —Femeref phrase meaning "that's not funny"

card.name: Goblin Elite Infantry
card.property: Whenever Goblin Elite Infantry blocks or becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Scouts
card.property: Create three 1/1 red Goblin Scout creature tokens with mountainwalk. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pathetic—like I wouldn't know a goblin painted up to look like a dwarf!" —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

card.name: Goblin Soothsayer
card.property: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Red creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see a great victory and rivers of blood. And . . . hmm, looks like a spleen." —Grishnak, goblin soothsayer

card.name: Goblin Tinkerer
card.property: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its converted mana cost to Goblin Tinkerer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Can they do that?" —Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

card.name: Granger Guildmage
card.property: {R}, {T}: Granger Guildmage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you. {W}, {T}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leave no mouth agape, no stomach unfilled. —Granger Guild maxim

card.name: Grasslands
card.property: Grasslands enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Grasslands: Search your library for a Forest or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Grave Servitude
card.property: You may cast Grave Servitude as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/-1 and is black.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I no longer believe in a final resting place." —Shauku, Endbringer

card.name: Gravebane Zombie
card.property: If Gravebane Zombie would die, put Gravebane Zombie on top of its owner's library instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A zombie's bed must be a lumpy one or he wouldn't leave it so often." —Rana, Suq'Ata market fool

card.name: Grim Feast
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Grim Feast deals 1 damage to you. Whenever a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Grinning Totem
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Grinning Totem: Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it. Then that player shuffles his or her library. Until the beginning of your next upkeep, you may play that card. At the beginning of your next upkeep, if you haven't played it, put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Hakim, Loreweaver
card.property: Flying {U}{U}: Return target Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to Hakim, Loreweaver. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only if Hakim isn't enchanted. {U}{U}, {T}: Destroy all Auras attached to Hakim.

card.name: Hall of Gemstone
card.property: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses a color. Until end of turn, lands tapped for mana produce mana of the chosen color instead of any other color.

card.name: Hammer of Bogardan
card.property: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player. {2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Harbinger of Night
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Embrace the Harbinger —Suq'Ata expression meaning "abandon hope"

card.name: Harbor Guardian
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Harbor Guardian attacks, defending player may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our guardian levies a tax on all traders. Wise travelers pay with a minimum of fuss." —Qhattib, Vizier of Amiqat

card.name: Harmattan Efreet
card.property: Flying {1}{U}{U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One moment I was walking along the beach, and the next I was high in the air, staring into a hideous smiling face." —Tarub, Suq'Ata sailor

card.name: Haunting Apparition
card.property: Flying As Haunting Apparition enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Haunting Apparition's power is equal to 1 plus the number of green creature cards in the chosen player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like some foul herdbeast, it grazes on the dead.

card.name: Hazerider Drake
card.property: Flying, protection from red

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hazerider danced in the thunderstorm and sang to its music." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Healing Salve
card.property: Choose one — • Target player gains 3 life. • Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Femeref look only to the Sun for healing; they have never truly understood life's cycle." —Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

card.name: Hivis of the Scale
card.property: You may choose not to untap Hivis of the Scale during your untap step. {T}: Gain control of target Dragon for as long as you control Hivis and Hivis remains tapped.

card.name: Horrible Hordes
card.property: Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few are able to underestimate the hordes.

card.name: Igneous Golem
card.property: {2}: Igneous Golem gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The creature rose from the mountain, its body weeping fire." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Illicit Auction
card.property: Each player may bid life for control of target creature. You start the bidding with a bid of 0. In turn order, each player may top the high bid. The bidding ends if the high bid stands. The high bidder loses life equal to the high bid and gains control of the creature. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Illumination
card.property: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell. Its controller gains life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A brilliant light can either illuminate or blind. How will you know which until you open your eyes?" —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Incinerate
card.property: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never taunt an embermage, 'What are you going to do about it?'" —Akin, seasoned askari

card.name: Infernal Contract
card.property: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

card.name: Iron Tusk Elephant
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fury in the lion's eye; the patience in the hippo's yawn; the pride within the griffin's cry are one within the iron tusk's stride." —"Iron Tusk," Femeref song

card.name: Island
card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Ivory Charm
card.property: Choose one — • All creatures get -2/-0 until end of turn. • Tap target creature. • Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Jabari's Influence
card.property: Cast Jabari's Influence only after combat. Gain control of target nonartifact, nonblack creature that attacked you this turn and put a -1/-0 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Common soldiers can't understand what a sidar knows: the enemy can be a resource." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Jolrael's Centaur
card.property: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What need have I for cavalry when I can have horse and rider both in one?" —Jolrael

card.name: Jolt
card.property: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's nothing like a sudden shock to clarify one's thoughts." —Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader

card.name: Jungle Patrol
Jungle Troll
card.property: {R}: Regenerate Jungle Troll. {G}: Regenerate Jungle Troll.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You eat plants; I eat plants. You eat beasts; I eat you." —Drulvurg, troll king

card.name: Jungle Wurm
card.property: Whenever Jungle Wurm becomes blocked, it gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Broad as a baobab—and about as smart.

card.name: Kaervek's Hex
card.property: Kaervek's Hex deals 1 damage to each nonblack creature and an additional 1 damage to each green creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the curse does not strike you dead, question your soul." —Kaervek

card.name: Kaervek's Purge
card.property: Destroy target creature with converted mana cost X. If that creature dies this way, Kaervek's Purge deals damage equal to the creature's power to the creature's controller.

card.name: Kaervek's Torch
card.property: As long as Kaervek's Torch is on the stack, spells that target it cost {2} more to cast. Kaervek's Torch deals X damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pulsing heat of the midday Sun burns in the Lion's eye. —Stone inscription, source unknown

card.name: Karoo Meerkat
card.property: Protection from blue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be like the meerkat, my daughters: ever vigilant, true to your own, and wary of strangers." —Nabil Alamat, Suq'Ata merchant

card.name: Kukemssa Pirates
card.property: Whenever Kukemssa Pirates attacks and isn't blocked, you may gain control of target artifact defending player controls. If you do, Kukemssa Pirates assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ". . . pirates gambled with a djinn and lost the thing more dear than gold." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Kukemssa Serpent
card.property: Kukemssa Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island. {U}, Sacrifice an Island: Target land an opponent controls becomes an Island until end of turn. When you control no Islands, sacrifice Kukemssa Serpent.

card.name: Lead Golem
card.property: Whenever Lead Golem attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slow and heavy swings the club.

card.name: Leering Gargoyle
card.property: Flying {T}: Leering Gargoyle gets -2/+2 and loses flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Only a gargoyle would take such delight in a thunderstorm." —Qhattib, Vizier of Amiqat

card.name: Lightning Reflexes
card.property: You may cast Lightning Reflexes as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has first strike.

card.name: Lion's Eye Diamond
card.property: Discard your hand, Sacrifice Lion's Eye Diamond: Add three mana of any one color to your mana pool. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Held in the lion's eye —Zhalfirin saying meaning "caught in the moment of crisis"

card.name: Locust Swarm
card.property: Flying {G}: Regenerate Locust Swarm. {G}: Untap Locust Swarm. Activate this ability only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better a fierce thunderhead than a sky filled with locusts.

card.name: Lure of Prey
card.property: Cast Lure of Prey only if an opponent cast a creature spell this turn. You may put a green creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Malignant Growth
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) At the beginning of your upkeep, put a growth counter on Malignant Growth. At the beginning of each opponent's draw step, that player draws an additional card for each growth counter on Malignant Growth, then Malignant Growth deals damage to the player equal to the number of cards he or she drew this way.

card.name: Mana Prism
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Mangara's Blessing
card.property: You gain 5 life. When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Mangara's Blessing, you gain 2 life, and you return Mangara's Blessing from your graveyard to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Mangara's Equity
card.property: As Mangara's Equity enters the battlefield, choose black or red. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Mangara's Equity unless you pay {1}{W}. Whenever a creature of the chosen color deals damage to you or a white creature you control, Mangara's Equity deals that much damage to that creature.

card.name: Mangara's Tome
card.property: When Mangara's Tome enters the battlefield, search your library for five cards, exile them in a face-down pile, and shuffle that pile. Then shuffle your library. {2}: The next time you would draw a card this turn, instead put the top card of the exiled pile into its owner's hand.

card.name: Marble Diamond
card.property: Marble Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Maro
card.property: Maro's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No two see the same Maro.

card.name: Meddle
card.property: If target spell has only one target and that target is a creature, change that spell's target to another creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Shadimir was as surprised as he was relieved when the blow turned aside." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Melesse Spirit
card.property: Flying, protection from black

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a laughing knife, immaculate and sharp, is the Melesse.

card.name: Memory Lapse
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, put it on top of its owner's library instead of into that player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The caliph was so intelligent he could not remember what he knew." —Azeworai, "Three Riddles"

card.name: Merfolk Raiders
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Turn your back for a second and they just vanish! As if they weren't shifty enough before." —Rhirhok, goblin archer

card.name: Merfolk Seer
card.property: When Merfolk Seer dies, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sea leaves no room for tears. —Zhalfirin adage

card.name: Mind Bend
card.property: Change the text of target permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another or one basic land type with another. (For example, you may change "nonblack creature" to "nongreen creature" or "forestwalk" to "islandwalk." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Mind Harness
card.property: Enchant red or green creature Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) You control enchanted creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Centuries ago, Mangara won the loyalty of the Quirion not by ruling their minds but by supporting their independence.

card.name: Mindbender Spores
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Flying Whenever Mindbender Spores blocks a creature, put four fungus counters on that creature. The creature gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a fungus counter on it" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fungus counter from this creature."

card.name: Mire Shade
card.property: {B}, Sacrifice a Swamp: Put a +1/+1 counter on Mire Shade. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We realized the bog had not given up a soul but had come to claim a new one." —Scout Ekemet, final journal

card.name: Misers' Cage
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has five or more cards in hand, Misers' Cage deals 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let him be imprisoned while his possessions wander free." —Suq'Ata legal decree

card.name: Mist Dragon
card.property: {0}: Mist Dragon gains flying. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) {0}: Mist Dragon loses flying. (This effect lasts indefinitely.) {3}{U}{U}: Mist Dragon phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Across the plains, farmers who braved the mists began to vanish. Most blamed the goblins; none guessed the truth." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Moss Diamond
card.property: Moss Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Mountain
card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.property: ({T}: Add {R} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Mountain Valley
card.property: Mountain Valley enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Mountain Valley: Search your library for a Mountain or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Mtenda Griffin
card.property: Flying {W}, {T}: Return Mtenda Griffin to its owner's hand and return target Griffin card from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Unlike Zhalfir, the griffin needs no council to keep harmony among its parts." —Asmira, Holy Avenger

card.name: Mtenda Herder
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All animals—even humans—can be herded. The trick is to make them think they choose their own destination." —Mangara

card.name: Mtenda Lion
card.property: Whenever Mtenda Lion attacks, defending player may pay {U}. If that player does, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by Mtenda Lion this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The lion drank that lake right up! In thanks, he gave Siti the power to speak with lions and make them leave the goats alone." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Mystical Tutor
card.property: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the tutors, a 'poem of sand' was of little account, a 'poem of ivory,' priceless." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Natural Balance
card.property: Each player who controls six or more lands chooses five lands he or she controls and sacrifices the rest. Each player who controls four or fewer lands may search his or her library for up to X basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield, where X is five minus the number of lands he or she controls. Then each player who searched his or her library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Nettletooth Djinn
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, Nettletooth Djinn deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The few of us who survived were denied entry to our camp for two days—so like the pox were the marks we bore." —Travelogue of Najat

card.name: Noble Elephant
card.property: Trample; banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Proud am I, / strong am I, / courageous in defending my children / and fierce in punishing what stands in my way." —"So the Elephant Speaks," Zhalfirin song

card.name: Nocturnal Raid
card.property: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The finest offering of night is not stealth but daring." —Tetlok, Breathstealer

card.name: Null Chamber
card.property: As Null Chamber enters the battlefield, you and an opponent each choose a card name other than a basic land card name. Spells with the chosen names can't be cast and lands with the chosen names can't be played.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Discovered by Femeref mages, the Null Chamber is the ultimate testing ground for the uncreative.

card.name: Pacifism
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

card.name: Painful Memories
card.property: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. Put that card on top of that player's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is terrible how one brief action can live forever in memory." —Jolrael

card.name: Patagia Golem
card.property: {3}: Patagia Golem gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It scattered falcons like a lion hunting among jackals.

card.name: Paupers' Cage
card.property: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Paupers' Cage deals 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A cage may keep you in, but it does not keep the stones out.

card.name: Pearl Dragon
card.property: Flying {1}{W}: Pearl Dragon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They knew Bantau was lost when, to hide the pearl he had found on the beach, he swallowed it—and soon grew wings." —Hakim, Loreweaver

card.name: Phyrexian Dreadnought
card.property: Trample When Phyrexian Dreadnought enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice any number of creatures with total power 12 or greater.

card.name: Phyrexian Purge
card.property: Destroy any number of target creatures. Phyrexian Purge costs 3 life more to cast for each target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only those who have nothing have nothing to fear.

card.name: Phyrexian Tribute
card.property: As an additional cost to cast Phyrexian Tribute, sacrifice two creatures. Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In your final breath you still have something to offer Phyrexia." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Phyrexian Vault
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The secrets of Phyrexia are expensive. You will pay in brass and bone, steel and sinew." —Kaervek

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Plains
card.property: ({T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.)

card.name: Political Trickery
card.property: Exchange control of target land you control and target land an opponent controls. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Politics is a game—move a stone here, move a stone there—except sometimes the stones bleed." —Shauku, Endbringer

card.name: Polymorph
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.

card.name: Power Sink
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If he or she doesn't, that player taps all lands with mana abilities he or she controls and empties his or her mana pool.

card.name: Preferred Selection
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top two cards of your library. You may sacrifice Preferred Selection and pay {2}{G}{G}. If you do, put one of those cards into your hand. If you don't, put one of those cards on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Prismatic Boon
card.property: Choose a color. X target creatures gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How ironic that the greatest forge of civilization is battle." —Mangara

card.name: Prismatic Circle
card.property: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.) As Prismatic Circle enters the battlefield, choose a color. {1}: The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Prismatic Lace
card.property: Target permanent becomes the color or colors of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

card.name: Psychic Transfer
card.property: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The memory of your existence will fade like the final stars of morning." —Kaervek

card.name: Purgatory
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile that card. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4} and 2 life. If you do, return a card exiled with Purgatory to the battlefield.

card.name: Purraj of Urborg
card.property: Purraj of Urborg has first strike as long as it's attacking. Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may pay {B}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Purraj of Urborg.

card.name: Pyric Salamander
card.property: {R}: Pyric Salamander gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Sacrifice Pyric Salamander at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you've been chased by a dragon, you run from every lizard. —Suq'Ata saying

card.name: Quirion Elves
card.property: As Quirion Elves enters the battlefield, choose a color. {T}: Add {G} to your mana pool. {T}: Add one mana of the chosen color to your mana pool.

card.name: Radiant Essence
card.property: Radiant Essence gets +1/+2 as long as an opponent controls a black permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her beauty was the beauty of the Sun at midday, deadly to those who underestimated her strength." —Azeworai, "Kenechi's Dream"

card.name: Raging Spirit
card.property: {2}: Raging Spirit becomes colorless until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Its burning power is more elusive than shade on the Unyaro Plains, more perilous than the horn of a rhino." —Akin, seasoned askari

card.name: Rampant Growth
card.property: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've never heard growth before." —Gowon, Femeref herder

card.name: Rashida Scalebane
card.property: {T}: Destroy target attacking or blocking Dragon. It can't be regenerated. You gain life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is not by the blood of dragons that Rashida measures victories, but by the sum of children who no longer wake from nightmares of scales and fire.

card.name: Ravenous Vampire
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sacrifice a nonartifact creature. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Ravenous Vampire. If you don't, tap Ravenous Vampire.

card.name: Ray of Command
card.property: Untap target creature an opponent controls and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. When you lose control of the creature, tap it.

card.name: Razor Pendulum
card.property: At the beginning of each player's end step, if that player has 5 or less life, Razor Pendulum deals 2 damage to him or her.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Amazing thing, gravity. It seems to work every time." —Telim'Tor

card.name: Reality Ripple
card.property: Target artifact, creature, or land phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Can you prepare for the unexpected? No, you cannot. You can prepare only to be surprised." —Teferi

card.name: Reckless Embermage
card.property: {1} {R}: Reckless Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to itself.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many mages have been consumed by their work.

card.name: Reflect Damage
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage this turn, that damage is dealt to that source's controller instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From you to me, so me to you. —Femeref children's taunt

card.name: Regeneration
card.property: Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.) {G}: Regenerate enchanted creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Death is not a debt I am yet willing to pay." —Purraj of Urborg

card.name: Reign of Chaos
card.property: Choose one — • Destroy target Plains and target white creature. • Destroy target Island and target blue creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Burning Isles are the home to a dozen lords who claim dominion. Jamuraa will look to only one leader: me." —Kaervek

card.name: Reign of Terror
card.property: Destroy all green creatures or all white creatures. They can't be regenerated. You lose 2 life for each creature that died this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know what takes them; they die around me without time to scream." —Scout Ekemet, final journal

card.name: Reparations
card.property: Whenever an opponent casts a spell that targets you or a creature you control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sorry I burned down your village. Here's some gold."

card.name: Restless Dead
card.property: {B}: Regenerate Restless Dead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rich's heirs often thank them after death . . . but preferably not in person. —Suq'Ata epigram

card.name: Ritual of Steel
card.property: Enchant creature When Ritual of Steel enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our soldiers are blessed with lizard scales as hard and cold as steel." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Rock Basilisk
card.property: Whenever Rock Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a non-Wall creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the eastern reaches of Jamuraa are arrangements of massive stones. No one knows their origins—for certain.

card.name: Rocky Tar Pit
card.property: Rocky Tar Pit enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Rocky Tar Pit: Search your library for a Swamp or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Roots of Life
card.property: As Roots of Life enters the battlefield, choose Island or Swamp. Whenever a land of the chosen type an opponent controls becomes tapped, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Sabertooth Cobra
card.property: Whenever Sabertooth Cobra deals damage to a player, he or she gets a poison counter. That player gets another poison counter at the beginning of his or her next upkeep unless he or she pays {2} before that step. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

card.name: Sacred Mesa
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus. {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves." —"Song to the Sun," Femeref song

card.name: Sand Golem
card.property: When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Sand Golem, return Sand Golem from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Sandbar Crocodile
card.property: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We've run aground sandbars before, but today, a sandbar ran aground us." —Kipkemboi, Kukemssa pirate

card.name: Sandstorm
card.property: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better to fight the sand for a few hours than to sleep beneath it forever. —Suq'Ata truism

card.name: Sapphire Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Target player draws a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. • Target creature gains flying until end of turn. • Target creature an opponent controls phases out. (While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during his or her next untap step.)

card.name: Savage Twister
card.property: Savage Twister deals X damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Frozen, we watched the funnel pluck up three of the goats—pook! pook! pook!—before we ran for the wadi." —Travelogue of Najat

card.name: Sawback Manticore
card.property: {4}: Sawback Manticore gains flying until end of turn. {1}: Sawback Manticore deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. Activate this ability only if Sawback Manticore is attacking or blocking and only once each turn.

card.name: Sea Scryer
card.property: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

card.property: Look at the top X cards of target opponent's library. Exile one of those cards and put the rest back on top of that player's library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's good to know more about your enemy's fate than your enemy does.

card.name: Searing Spear Askari
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{R}: Searing Spear Askari gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the other soldiers of Zhalfir fall, the askaris will yet stand.

card.name: Seedling Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Return target Aura attached to a creature to its owner's hand. • Regenerate target green creature. • Target creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Seeds of Innocence
card.property: Destroy all artifacts. They can't be regenerated. The controller of each of those artifacts gains life equal to its converted mana cost.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have hidden from the machinations of Zhalfir for centuries. Why should I join your campaign?" —Jolrael

card.name: Serene Heart
card.property: Destroy all Auras.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If magic is your crutch, cast it aside and learn to walk without it." —Teferi

card.property: {B}, Pay 1 life: Sewer Rats gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability no more than three times each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You lie down with rats, and the rats run away. —Suq'Ata insult

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To keep the dead so others may live. —Shadow Guild maxim

card.name: Shadowbane
card.property: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you and/or creatures you control this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a black source is prevented this way, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Light creates shadow; light destroys shadow. Such is the transience of darkness.

card.property: Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good help is hard to dig up.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shape this world in Zhalfir's image. —Shaper Guild maxim

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To buy unseen land, pay in unseen coin. —Suq'Ata maxim

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Prophecy is whatever one makes of it, but destiny cannot be changed." —Sidar Jabari

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They exist only so long as the living take no notice." —Kifimbo, Shadow Guildmage

card.property: Sky Diamond enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.

property.value: "Would you give up your hands to fly? That is what the birds have done." —The One Thousand Questions

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no sweeter music than the wails of a dying dragon." —Rashida Scalebane

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Comfortable even in a furnace? I've never met one who'd accept my wager." —Talibah, embermage

If that player discards a card this way, Tainted Specter deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Talruum Minotaur
card.property: Haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't insult a Talruum unless your mount is swift. —Suq'Ata saying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Taniwha rolls in its sleep, and the land is awash with the waves." —Poetics of Hanan

card.property: Flying; trample; rampage 4 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+4 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

card.name: Teferi's Curse
card.property: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent has phasing. (It phases in or out before its controller untaps during each of his or her untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Stepping through time is like riding a camel. It may get you where you want to go, but the ride is rarely pleasant." —Teferi

card.name: Teferi's Drake
card.property: Flying Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We threw dried fruit to the drakes that rode the air, streaming along the Weatherlight's side as we sailed amidst the clouds." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

card.property: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) Teferi's Isle enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}{U} to your mana pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The three wizards knew only that this isle held a great mystery—and that patience alone would solve it.

card.property: {2}, {T}: Telim'Tor's Darts deals 1 damage to target player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Execution awaits the dissenter." —Kasib ibn Naji, Letters

If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When we're aloft, I love to lean over the Weatherlight's railing and watch the patterns the griffins' shadows make on the clouds below." —Sisay, Captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first of the Thousand Deaths.

property.name: Flavor

At the beginning of each end step or when Tombstone Stairwell leaves the battlefield, destroy all tokens created with Tombstone Stairwell. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Torrent of Lava

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mountain's voice shouts us all down.

card.name: Tranquil Domain
card.property: Destroy all non-Aura enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An ancient court mage unified the houses into guilds to serve Zhalfir above their own interests. Even during the civil war, the guilds stood together, a testament to the wisdom of Teferi." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Tropical Storm

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "After the storm, I found a sea turtle dying on the sands, a blade of grass driven through its shell." —Travelogue of Najat

card.name: Uktabi Faerie

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victim of the two-toed faerie —Suq'Ata expression meaning "broken"

card.name: Uktabi Wildcats

card.property: {1}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like Day from Night, / I'll live my life apart from you, just glimpsing you across the sky, / because you cannot change, my dear, and nor can I." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

property.name: Flavor

property.value: "What is taking them so long to fill the waterskins?" —Mwani, Mtenda goatherd

card.property: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Ward of Lights
card.property: You may cast Ward of Lights as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature As Ward of Lights enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Ward of Lights.

card.name: Warping Wurm
card.property: Phasing (This phases in or out before you untap during each of your untap steps. While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Warping Wurm phases out unless you pay {2}{G}{U}. When Warping Wurm phases in, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Wave Elemental
card.property: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Wave Elemental: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider the wave: how weak the mother yet how strong the child." —Tywanna, Shaper Guildmage

card.name: Wellspring
card.property: Enchant land When Wellspring enters the battlefield, gain control of enchanted land until end of turn. At the beginning of your upkeep, untap enchanted land. You gain control of that land until end of turn.

card.name: Wild Elephant
card.property: Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will tell my father's stories . . . . How the elephants trampled the leopard cub, and its father, though he knew, killed nine goats instead." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Wildfire Emissary

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Windreaper Falcon
card.property: Flying, protection from blue

card.name: Withering Boon

property.name: Flavor

card.name: Worldly Tutor
card.property: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Aselbo soon had the rhino eating from his palm and the snake waiting at his heels." —Afari, Tales

card.name: Yare
card.property: Target creature defending player controls gets +3/+0 until end of turn. That creature can block up to two additional creatures this turn.

card.name: Zebra Unicorn
card.property: Whenever Zebra Unicorn deals damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll capture gentle zebras / for your steeds and fill the stable with every kind of unicorn." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Zhalfirin Commander
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {1}{W}{W}: Target Knight creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Command is the act of balancing on a vine and convincing others that it is firm ground." —Sidar Jabari

card.name: Zhalfirin Knight
card.property: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) {W}{W}: Zhalfirin Knight gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You returned a warrior. . . . Your hair was cut, your eye tattooed with the red triangle of war." —"Love Song of Night and Day"

card.name: Zirilan of the Claw
Zombie Mob
card.property: Zombie Mob enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature card in your graveyard. When Zombie Mob enters the battlefield, exile all creature cards from your graveyard.

card.name: Zuberi, Golden Feather
card.property: Flying Other Griffin creatures get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If the griffins tell of their gods, perhaps they speak of feathers bright as the Sun." —Afari, Tales
